channel.title: Oyo Ruined My Anniversary
channel.description: Recent content on Oyo Ruined My Anniversary

item.title: How Oyo Ruined My Anniversary
item.description: TLDR: Oyo allowed me to book a hotel which had payment issues with Oyo Made me wait 2 hours on call on a remote island with no connectivity before transferring me. Tried to transfer me to another hotel 1300KMs away Made me pay Rs.1800 more for a downgrade Cancelled my new booking Made me pay Rs.400 more on top of Rs.1800 Connected me to a customer instead of a manager during a call transfer Offered me Rs.
